content.text: Hi, I'm Larry. I'm a chef.
Hi Larry, I'm Ben. I'm a personal trainer.
Oh, cool. Do you like your job?
Yeah, I love it. I get to help people get healthier and happier.
That's awesome. I love my job too. I get to create delicious food for people to enjoy.
That's great. I love to cook, but I'm not very good at it.
You should try it sometime. It's a lot of fun.
I might just do that. Thanks for the advice.
No problem. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the gym, watch movies, and read comic books.
Oh, cool. I like to go to the gym too. I also like to cook, read, and play video games.
We have a lot in common.
I think so too. It's nice to meet you, Ben.
It's nice to meet you too, Larry.
